de.undercouch.citeproc.script
Interface ScriptRunner

All Known Implementing Classes:
JREScriptRunner, RhinoScriptRunner
public interface ScriptRunner

Executes JavaScript scripts

Author:
Michel Kraemer

eval

            throws ScriptRunnerException
Executes the given code

Parameters:
code - the code
Returns:
the return value from the executed script
Throws:
ScriptRunnerException - if the given code could not be executed

eval

Object eval(Reader reader)
            throws ScriptRunnerException,
                   IOException
Executes a script provided by a given reader

Parameters:
reader - the reader
Returns:
the return value from the executed script
Throws:
ScriptRunnerException - if the script could not be executed
IOException - if the script could not be read from the reader
